subject: Ordre #ssn5877
description_text:
hi how long will it take before you ship my order but i only got an email that  have received the order and I have ordered express delivery
Mvh Jimmy Reimer

conversations.body_text: Hi Jimmy Reimer,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

hi . has my order been shipped. because i can see that you have already withdrawn the money from my bank
Mvh Jimmy Reimer

Den 15. jan. 2026 kl. 03.03 skrev service@simsonn.com:

﻿
Hi Jimmy Reimer,

We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.
Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hi Jimmy Reimer,  ​We have checked that your order has not been shipped yet. Due to the impact of heavy snow in Europe on the goods sent to our German warehouse, road congestion and delivery delays have occurred. However, we will speed up the delivery or explore other logistics channels to ship from China as soon as possible. We are very sorry for this, as this is an unexpected situation for us.

that's not good enough . If it's not shipped by Friday I would like to cancel my order and get my money back
Mvh Jimmy Reimer

Den 19. jan. 2026 kl. 07.51 skrev service@simsonn.com:

﻿
Hi Jimmy Reimer,

​We have checked that your order has not been shipped yet. Due to the impact of heavy snow in Europe on the goods sent to our German warehouse, road congestion and delivery delays have occurred. However, we will speed up the delivery or explore other logistics channels to ship from China as soon as possible. We are very sorry for this, as this is an unexpected situation for us.

Hi Jimmy Reimer,  ​We are very sorry for the trouble caused to you. We have learned about the latest progress of the logistics and it is expected to arrange the shipment around the 22nd. We apologize to you again.

okay I guess I'll get a tracking number when I've sent it
Mvh Jimmy Reimer

Den 19. jan. 2026 kl. 09.19 skrev service@simsonn.com:

﻿
Hi Jimmy Reimer,

​We are very sorry for the trouble caused to you. We have learned about the latest progress of the logistics and it is expected to arrange the shipment around the 22nd. We apologize to you again.
Hi Jimmy Reimer,  ​​Of course, we will update the tracking number immediately after shipping.​You don't need to worry.
